alert.note: Alert for Ceiba; Humacao; Juncos; Las Piedras; Maunabo; Naguabo; Patillas; San Lorenzo; Yabucoa (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 26 at 10:31AM ADT until October 26 at 1:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Ceiba County in Puerto Rico... Humacao County in Puerto Rico... Juncos County in Puerto Rico... Las Piedras County in Puerto Rico... Maunabo County in Puerto Rico... Naguabo County in Puerto Rico... Patillas County in Puerto Rico... San Lorenzo County in Puerto Rico... Yabucoa County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1230 PM AST. * At 931 AM AST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar and river gauges. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Ceiba; Humacao; Juncos; Las Piedras; Maunabo; Naguabo; Patillas; San Lorenzo; Yabucoa
